item.title: Getting started with angular-ui-grid
item.description: Installation or Setup # Requirements: Supported Browsers: IE9+ Chrome Firefox Safari 5+ Opera Android 4 AngularJS 1.4.0+ Getting Started Download the source files from ui-grid github and include them in your project including the dependencies: <link rel="styleSheet" href="release/ui-grid.min.css"/> <script src="http://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/angularjs/1.3.16/angular.min.js"></script> <script src="/release/ui-grid.min.js"></script> At this point you should be able to use ui-grid. Creating a Simple Grid # Step 1 - Include the uiGrid in your project <link rel="styleSheet" href="release/ui-grid.min.css"/> <script src="http://ajax.
